name: You Win Some, You Lose Some (Mr.Ocean)
name_original: You Win Some, You Lose Some (Mr.Ocean)
description: The entire premise behind a game is the idea that you are trying to win the game. However, You Win Some, You Lose Some is centered around losing at each levels intended gameplay style. Level one consists of a racing section where you are trying to be as slow as possible, and level two is a bullet hell  in which you are  trying to get hit.  We also mix together two arts tyles consisting of 3D and 2D artwork in the same scene. Our theme is that losing and winning shouldn't mix well, and we stylized our design process as such.
